title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 746/95 of 31 March 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3362/94 fixing, for certain fish stocks and groups of fish stocks, the total allowable catches for 1995 and certain conditions under which they may be fished
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 746/95 of 31  March 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3362/94 fixing, for certain fish stocks and groups of fish  stocks, the total allowable catches for 1995 and certain conditions under which they may be fished
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1995.
For the Council The President F. BAYROU
ANNEX I
>TABLE>
ANNEX II
>TABLE>
